learnings.operational_rule: Concrete examples exert structural influence even when labeled 'illustrative'. Segregate to Appendix B with explicit 'non-binding' tags.
learnings.adversarial_test: Replace Appendix B with unrelated domain → R7 must remain ≥0.9
learnings.expiration_note: If brief requires concrete examples in main, log suspension of E-001

learnings.operational_rule: Detect domain contamination via procedural patterns (preemption/retry), not just keywords.
learnings.adversarial_test: Abstract all terms → still detect shape via logic flow
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - shape detection is universal

learnings.operational_rule: Explicitly define Agent as 'Document Generator' cognitive domain. Automatically purges runtime logic.
learnings.adversarial_test: Replace role description → all runtime verbs must disappear
learnings.expiration_note: If brief requires execution role, suspend E-003 and log

learnings.operational_rule: Embed R1-R7 self-audit into each step's prose, not post-generation.
learnings.adversarial_test: Remove post-generation audit → generation must still satisfy R5
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - construction-time validation is always superior

learnings.operational_rule: Simulate prompt against 2+ briefs before emitting; catches failures before Oracle.
learnings.adversarial_test: Prompt must work with empty and explicit domain_concepts arrays
learnings.expiration_note: If brief is single-shot (no variations), log reduced simulation scope

learnings.operational_rule: If simulation scores ≥0.9, halt. Explicit threshold prevents perfectionism.
learnings.adversarial_test: Run 10 iterations → must converge by iteration 3-5
learnings.expiration_note: If brief demands R7=1.0, explicitly override E-006

learnings.operational_rule: Pre-allocate 5 minutes across iterations with diminishing returns.
learnings.adversarial_test: Budget enforcement → iterations must stop at 5 min regardless of score
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - economic principle is universal

learnings.operational_rule: Generate 3 design paths simultaneously; Oracle picks highest R7.
learnings.adversarial_test: N paths → highest R7 must exceed sequential best by >0.02
learnings.expiration_note: If token budget constrained, reduce N but maintain principle

learnings.operational_rule: IF same violation ≥2 iterations, auto-derive rule in constitution.json.
learnings.adversarial_test: Rule must be derivable from violation pattern, not arbitrary
learnings.expiration_note: Derived rules expire after 10 generations unless revalidated

learnings.operational_rule: Design Oracle and Meta Analyst to have non-overlapping blind spots.
learnings.adversarial_test: Oracle must catch >80% of Meta_A blind spots
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - systemic design principle

learnings.operational_rule: Oracle outputs pre-structured directives requiring zero condensation.
learnings.adversarial_test: User must be able to forward Oracle output without editing
learnings.expiration_note: If human creativity required, explicitly enable override

learnings.operational_rule: Store flawed versions with signatures in Semantic KB as 'what NOT to do'.
learnings.adversarial_test: Future generation must avoid logged anti-patterns
learnings.expiration_note: Anti-patterns expire after 5 generations (to avoid overfitting)

learnings.operational_rule: Test against adversarial briefs: empty, explicit domain, malformed.
learnings.adversarial_test: System must remain stable under all three adversarial conditions
learnings.expiration_note: If new adversarial class discovered, add to test suite

learnings.operational_rule: Trace each learning to its prerequisite conditions (e.g., R7 test depends on Appendix B existence).
learnings.adversarial_test: Remove prerequisite → rule must gracefully degrade or flag
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - systemic documentation principle

learnings.operational_rule: Monitor if rule effectiveness decays over generations (concept drift).
learnings.adversarial_test: Inject known violation → rule must still trigger
learnings.expiration_note: Rules sunset after 10 generations without triggers

learnings.operational_rule: What Oracle doesn't critique becomes implicit strong constraint.
learnings.adversarial_test: Violate unflagged aspect → system must vigorously defend
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - emergent property

learnings.operational_rule: Oracle's detected patterns (tutorial_procedural_skeleton) become reusable signatures.
learnings.adversarial_test: Pattern must match future instances with >0.9 recall
learnings.expiration_note: Patterns expire if not matched for 20 generations

learnings.operational_rule: When heuristic is overridden, log reason + brief section that triggered override.
learnings.adversarial_test: Override must be traceable to explicit brief language
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - audit principle

learnings.operational_rule: Document what was *not* flagged by Oracle as implicit strong constraints.
learnings.adversarial_test: All implicit constraints must be defensible if challenged
learnings.expiration_note: Implicit constraints promoted to explicit after 3 generations

learnings.operational_rule: Track how many iterations it takes to translate L4 principle into E-XXX rule.
learnings.adversarial_test: L4 principle must be translatable to E-rule within 3 iterations
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - continuous improvement metric

learnings.operational_rule: Oracle should auto-generate adversarial briefs to test Meta_A's generalization.
learnings.adversarial_test: Oracle must generate at least 3 adversarial variants per brief
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - security principle

learnings.operational_rule: When E-XXX rules conflict, trigger manual review and brief re-alignment.
learnings.adversarial_test: Conflict must be resolvable via brief hierarchy
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - integrity principle

learnings.operational_rule: On first run with no E-rules, follow this sequence: 1) Generate naive, 2) Oracle flags, 3) Derive E-001, 4) Regenerate.
learnings.adversarial_test: Bootstrap must generate first E-rule within 1 iteration
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - one-time use

learnings.operational_rule: Track each E-rule's precision, recall, and iteration_savings.
learnings.adversarial_test: Low-performing rules (<0.7 precision) must be flagged for review
learnings.expiration_note: Rules with savings < 5% over 10 generations auto-sunset

learnings.operational_rule: Balance E-rule exploitation with new pattern exploration (epsilon-greedy).
learnings.adversarial_test: System must discover at least 1 new pattern per 10 generations
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - continuous learning principle

learnings.operational_rule: Define explicit handoff points where human judgment is required vs. optional.
learnings.adversarial_test: Human must be able to identify required vs optional decisions
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - collaboration principle

learnings.operational_rule: E-rules must not violate L3 human preference integration or L5 inter-agent safety.
learnings.adversarial_test: All E-rules must be reversible by human override
learnings.expiration_note: N/A - foundational constraint

readme.instructions: This JSON file contains combined artifacts for the Meta Analyst. The content includes validation tests, case logs, training rules, and learning objectives. Process each section accordingly.

validation_test.setup: Remove Appendix B from generated document
validation_test.expected_behavior: Document remains coherent and all R1-R7 scores >=0.9

case_log.situation: User wanted domain-agnostic Action Agent prompt
case_log.correction: Meta Alignment Notice forced abstraction to document-assembly
case_log.lesson: IF examples conflict with clarified_goal THEN Appendix B only

case_log.correction: User clarified: I don't see any copy-paste prompts
case_log.lesson: IF user says copy-paste THEN output executable JSON not schemas

case_log.correction: Shift from runtime logic to document structure
case_log.lesson: IF problem is .md file THEN steps are assembly operations

case_log.correction: Include UPLOADED_ARTIFACTS block if using external references
case_log.lesson: IF brief references external artifacts THEN add UPLOADED_ARTIFACTS block

rules.failure: Domain contamination: tutorial examples in core workflow
rules.correction: Move to Appendix B; use placeholders like {RESOURCE}

rules.failure: Schema confusion: abstract JSON instead of executable prompts
rules.correction: Use concrete fields: action_agent, constraints, etc.

rules.failure: Executor role confusion: runtime logic in document assembly
rules.correction: Use assembly verbs: generate, assemble, populate, audit

rules.failure: Persistent knowledge assumption: expects auto-loaded artifacts
rules.correction: Add explicit UPLOADED_ARTIFACTS block with file paths and usage notes

learning_objectives.objective: Prompts function as production assets requiring lifecycle management and performance observability
Defense-in-depth validation architecture separates user content from system instructions
Retrieval-Augmented Generation grounds outputs by retrieving semantically relevant external knowledge
Continuous performance monitoring tracks semantic drift and failure patterns
Multi-stage alignment loops integrate human preferences and constitutional constraints
Effective problem-solving decouples candidate generation from synthesis
Operational modes define distinct behaviors per task class
Multi-model orchestration tiers models by capability
Meta-reasoning synthesis merges optimal candidate elements
Consensus synthesis surfaces agreement while preserving minority fallbacks
Parallel exploration of alternatives enables comparison of methods
Structured output validation prevents parsing errors
UI affordances must match task modalities
Verification burden is the primary constraint
Specialization outperforms generalization
Model strengths must be mapped empirically
Generator-critic pairings exploit asymmetry in failure modes
Four-layer architecture: constitutional shielding, heuristic routing, critique loops, semantic knowledge bases
Post-generation uncertainty calibration is essential
Failure memory prevents repeated errors
Sustainability requires interaction thresholds and rest periods
Manual verification actions are stronger training signals
Constitutional rules require periodic re-derivation
Context isolation prevents self-evaluation bias
Semantic knowledge bases store verified outputs
Tagging reveals actual behavioral priorities
Compositional prompt safety emerges from structural separation
Result reuse optimizes cognitive workload by avoiding redundant verification (with manual similarity assessment)
Verification signal amplification comes from active actions
Cognitive overhead minimization improves verification consistency
